sect1.title: $config_dir
sect1.para: This is the directory used to store config files used in the templates. Default is ./configs, meaning that Smarty will look for the configs/ directory in the same directory as the executing php script.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: It is not recommended to put this directory under the web server document root.

note.title: Note
note.para: As of Smarty 3.1 the attribute $config_dir is no longer accessible directly. Use getConfigDir(), setConfigDir() and addConfigDir() instead.

sect1.para: See also getConfigDir(), setConfigDir() and addConfigDir().
